UPDATE SUBSCRIBE SET DELIVER_STATUS = '결제취소' WHERE RECEIPT_ID = #{receiptId} AND DELIVER_STATUS = '배송준비'
mapper.update:
UPDATE SUBSCRIBE SET DELIVER_STATUS = CASE
WHEN TO_DATE(DELIVER_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= 0 THEN '배송완료' WHEN TO_DATE(DELIVER_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= 1 THEN '배송중' ELSE '배송준비'
END WHERE NOT DELIVER_STATUS IN('결제취소')
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT RECEIPT_ID FROM SUBSCRIBE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND NOT DELIVER_STATUS IN('결제취소')

SELECT SUBSCRIBE_NO, SP.SUBPRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(SUB_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "SUB_DATE", SUB_LEVEL, SUB_RECEIVER_USER, SUB_RECEIVER_PHONE, DELIVER_AT, DELIVER_AT, DELIVER_TO, SUB_RECEIVER_POSTCODE, RECEIPT_ID, SP.SUB_PRICE, DELIVER_STATUS, SUBPRODUCT_NAME, SUBCHANGE_NAME FROM SUBSCRIBE S, SUB_PRODUCT SP WHERE RECEIPT_ID = #{receiptId} AND S.SUBPRODUCT_NO = SP.SUBPRODUCT_NO AND DELIVER_STATUS IN ('배송준비', '배송중', '배송완료') ORDER BY S.SUBSCRIBE_NO ASC
